Reviews.Title: lots of problems
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "olcanuck"
Reviews.Content: this was bought as a new windows 7 machine. It must have been a reconditioned unit as it arrived with several persistent viruses and have been getting rid of the residue ever since. Mechanically it seems great.The Norton 360 that came with the computer was unaware of the problems and could not fix them. I installed Enegma Spy Hunter which I use on my base machine and it fixed problems right away.

Reviews.Title: Love my Gateway !
Reviews.Author: Bill L Chesterman
Reviews.Content: Love this laptop !  Fits my every need !  I spilled coffee on my other laptop and had to buy a new one, so this was my choice and I'm so glad I chose this one !!

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Jerry Bryan, Bryan Enterprises "jbryan"
Reviews.Content: Ok for the money but really gets hot quick and performance is fair..I purchased it for an elderly man but would not use for myself,

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: carolynbaylander
Reviews.Content: It was everything the product was advertised.  I would recommend this for online buying.  17 inch is what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: No problems, works well.
Reviews.Author: R. Dotson "illegitiminoncarborundum"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a used/reconditioned version of this laptop two or three weeks ago and have had no problems whatsoever. It booted up and everything seemed to be in factory condition. So far I've had no problems migrating my other data and applications over from an older Toshiba laptop with an intermittently stuck ESC key to this nice laptop with its magnificent display. The first thing I did was to uninstall the usual crapware that comes with all new computers these days, but I'm perfectly happy with it.The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because all the keys are flat and uniform with no texture, which makes it more difficult for me as a touch typist because I prefer slightly contoured keys, but I think a nice soft clear rubber keyboard cover should take care of the problem.

Reviews.Title: bought this laptop
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Slankster
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this laptop because it still had Windows 7 when after shopping in several stores where they only had Windows 8, usually buy HP products but now I have two favorites!

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product
Reviews.Author: SLP
Reviews.Content: Works very well. Would buy again if I needed another one. The price is fantastic for a Windows 7, which is what I bought. I refuse to buy a Windows 8. All other companies wanted more money for W-7 and only a 15 inch screen. Acer charged the least amount and I got a 17 inch screen. Nice Job Gateway!
